name: OnsiShop Database Setup
description: Ensures database is ready when opening the project

scripts.setup: node setup-db.js && echo 'Setup complete! Ready to run npm run dev'
scripts.reset-all: npm run db:reset && echo 'Database reset complete!'

onProjectOpen: 2. Run 'npm run setup' to ensure database is ready
3. Run 'npm run dev' to start the development server
4. Visit http://localhost:3000 to see your app
ifDataMissing: 1. Run 'npm run quick-check' to see what's missing
2. Run 'npm run db:seed' to restore data
3. Or run 'npm run reset-all' for a fresh start
